item.description:
Bring your Pocket Constitution.....

REMEMBER IN A HEALTHY DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC THERE ARE SUPPOSED TO BE OPPOSING VIEW POINTS!!
And the rule book (The Constitution) should remain as our guide.

I went to public school so I HAVE HAD NO FREAKIN' IDEA WHAT THAT THING SAYS for the past few decades!! This is important stuff and we should all be better versed in our rights and the original intent of the founders.

Discussion will continue where we left off at the May MeetUp.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: Back to the Constitution!
